title: Constraint-Based Approach for Team Sports Learning Design: Ecological Dynamics-Based Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic team sports theory knowledge and practical experience possession
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, Domain expertise: advanced, Delivery method: video lectures + discussion board, Assessment method: project-based evaluation.

learning_goals: A team sports learning environment design plan based on ecological dynamics theory can be proposed

Behavior-affording elements (affordances) occurring across multiple time scales can be analyzed and applied to learning design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
